website_summaries.verdict: Extremely wide and sturdy ramp that can handle the largest dirt bikes and motorcycles easily.
pros: Measures 17.25-inches in width, so you'll never have to worry about the bike slipping off the edge of the ramp
Offers a maximum weight capacity support of 1,500 pounds
Folds down to a size of 48 by 17.25 inches
Uses serrated crossbars in the design to give the bike's wheels traction
cons: At 38 pounds, this ramp is much heavier than most models

customer_reviews.title: Check this out as soon as you receive it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to load a full size v-twin into the bed of my truck. I didn't get around to needing it for about 5 weeks. When it did try, I found that it is too narrow to walk the bike up, it has to be ridden. I'm in my 70's and don't do that anymore. When I tried to return it, I was told "to bad" it is outside the 30 day return window. Now I'm stuck with it. I was going to replace it with a tri-fold one from the same company. Not now.
customer_reviews.author: Tomden2

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Heavy Duty Yet Light
customer_reviews.text: I love this folding heavy duty ramp, I rode my 04 Gold Wing into our shed with no problems at all, and that bike weighs about 850lbs! I love the black finish on the ramp, welds are very very good! I am totally happy with purchasing this ramp. I now want one that it is made about 4' wide and folding!!! Come on Titan! Thanks for a great ramp!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Krock

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, easily holds the weight of the motorcycle and myself approximately 1150lbs , easy to handle, with the safety strap it doesn't move off the tailgate, stores right along the cycle in the truck bed. It's not quite wide enough to safely load and unload the cycle while on the cycle so I use a 2x10 along with the ramp so I have a place for my feet. If I buy another one o would get it from Titan ( very nice people ) but make it a little wider
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Held up wonderful. We used it to ride our 800+lbs Harley Street Glide into our storage shed. It didn’t bend or buckle under 1000+lbs (hubby and bike). Also it was delivered super fast. Delivery was estimated to take about a week but I received it in two days which was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: LaQuinta Clark-Hollinshead

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. It is long enough so the the incline isn't too bad. It easily holds me and my Goldwing. It is heavy, so it isn't too easy to maneuver around for a small person. I have no issues, but my wife does. Overall it is awesome and I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight K. Schrute

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to take apart and works well as a separate ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the ramp to get motorcycle, which weighs 1150 lbs with me on it, into the shed. The ramp does not flex at all. I used the entire length of the ramp a few times, but I decided to take it apart and only use half since the shed isn't very high. It was easy to take apart and works well as a separate piece.
customer_reviews.author: Gotham1

customer_reviews.title: it's excellent, a great addition to my motorcycle trailer
customer_reviews.text: The package was damaged in shipping, so one of the rails was bent and scratched, nothing I couldn't straighten and fix with a bit of paint. Function-wise, it's excellent, a great addition to my motorcycle trailer. I'm older, and not the strongest guy in the world, but it being aluminum, I can handle this weight easily and the extended length makes it SO easy to load my bikes. The fold-up feature makes it easy to store and carry in the trailer. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jones

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: Looks good so far... pulling a Bagger Harley into the Storage barn no problems... the bike destroyed the small lawn mower ramps... its worth the extra cash for the piece of mind when you up in the air knowing it will not fold into... JS
customer_reviews.author: BIGGWAKE.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Probably cost 2 much but It is nice and worked
customer_reviews.author: Batman77

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality ramp however wasn't wide enough to walk my harley in the truck. I recommend two of them for width increase.

customer_reviews.title: Great ramp!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this ramp! It's easy enough for a 56 year old woman to carry and set up by herself. I highly recommend this ramp.

customer_reviews.title: Seller did what they said. Product is as adertised
customer_reviews.text: It's a sturdy, but light weight product at a very reasonable price.

product_meta.title: Titan 8' HD Wide 4-Beam Truck Load Ramp Motorcycle Harley Cruiser Dirtbike 1500 lb Capacity
product_meta.description:
This heavy duty wide Titan 8 ft ramp is the ultimate solution when loading your motorcycle (or other two-wheeled items) into a truck or trailer.

The improved 4 beam design now features 5/8" thick rungs for more support when loading your heavy items. One individual ramp is included.

Features:
- Capacity: 1,500 lb
- Arched design for better clearance
- Serrated crossbars allow for great traction
- Includes one individual ramp
- Safety straps included
- Thicker 4 beam design

Specifications:
- Weight: 38 lb
- Size: 94" L x 17.25" W
- Folds: 48" x 17.25" x 6"
- Beams: 4
- Rungs: HD 5/8" diameter
- Average rung spacing: 4.25"
- Material: Aluminum
